Compact Carbon Capture

Home About Contact Product

“3C is a groundbreaking new technology for CO2 capture. The technology allows for capturing CO2 limited space available. Due to its compactness it could even be placed on top of existing infrastructure or buildings. We are reducing the size of the equipment by 75%, without loosing efficiency or increasing pressuredrop”

Torleif Madsen
Chief Executive Officer
Marineholmen in Bergen, Norway.
